plot outline: Srinu is a happy go lucky village youth who falls in love with Chaitra. Things become difficult for Srinu when he finds out that Lilly, who doesn't like him, happens to be Chaitra's best friend. Despite Srinu's many careful attempts to woo Chaitra, Lilly keeps creating problems for him. Just when Chaitra starts getting feelings for Srinu, something unexpected happens.
title: Sakala Kala Vallabhudu
plot: _Sakala Kala Vallabhudu_ (qv) is a Telugu movie starring Tanishq Reddy, Meghla Muktha in prominent roles. It is a commercial entertainer directed by Shiva Ganesh.

Srinu is a happy go lucky village youth who falls in love with Chaitra. Things become difficult for Srinu when he finds out that Lilly, who doesn't like him, happens to be Chaitra's best friend. Despite Srinu's many careful attempts to woo Chaitra, Lilly keeps creating problems for him. Just when Chaitra starts getting feelings for Srinu, something unexpected happens.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
